roleset.name: currently holding office
roleset.note: INCUMBENCY-N, INCUMBENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia.

example.name: incumbent-j
example.text: A member may sit in the Senate so long as he is incumbent in the office which entitles him to a place therein.
example.arg: in the office which entitles him to a place therein

example.name: incumbency-n
example.text: ... during his incumbency as a trustee...

roleset.name: imposed obligation
roleset.note: INCUMBENCY-N, INCUMBENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia.

example.name: incumbent-j
example.text: It is incumbent upon Pyongyang to give up its nuclear project and come forward as a responsible member of the international community
example.arg: to give up its nuclear project and come forward as a responsible member of the international community

example.name: incumbency-n
example.text: Moreover, the council insisted on the universality of the mission, both in its incumbency upon every baptized person and in its direction to the entire world:

roleset.name: physically lying upon (oft geological)
roleset.note: INCUMBENCY-N, INCUMBENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia.

example.name: incumbent-j
example.text: In Hesse, coal is found to lie over basaltes, but nowhere else, it is believed, has that stone been found incumbent upon coal.
